name: Healing White Tara
description: Healing White Tara - Bring the healing power of White Tara into you life with this wonderful meditation strand. White Tara, also called "the Mother of all Buddhas" is the perfect embodiment of graceful power, wisdom and purity. The White Tara is carved in white jade and framed in Tibetan silver. The 108 beads are carved, naturally shed bone. The guru bead is a beautiful silver capped copal. $65

name: Om Mani Padme Hum
description: Om Mani Padme Hum - Is the mantra to call to Kuan Yin. The mantra is inscribed on lapis lazuli in this wonderful strand of 108 lapis lazuli beads. Small silver bells chime your cries to Her as you call upon Her for help! $65

name: Tree of Life
description: Tree of Life - A Tree of Life adorns a silver tone poison pill pendant. It opens to hold herbs, prayers, or whatever you want to put in it. A pewter pentacle dangles beside. The 90 beads are flourite and capped red crab agate. A wonderful meditation strand. $65

name: Kuan Yin of Compassion and Protection
description: Kuan Yin of Compassion and Protection - Kuan Yin is carved in beautiful shell.  She wraps her many arms around all of Her children, bringing safety and protection.  There are 108 black jade beads. Black Jade is an etheric bodyguard and a stone of protection. Its strong elemental energy shields not only the physical body, but guards against negative forces or entities, energy vampires and people projecting anger and aggression. The guru beads ia capped amber. Amber is a powerful healer that gives the person who wears it a lovely sense of health and healing. It balances the emotions, clears the mind, releases negative energy, aids manifestation, eases stress by clearing phobias and fears. $65

name: Kuan Yin's Peaceful Love
description: Kuan Yin's Peaceful Love - A beautiful 1,000 armed Kuan Yin is carved in mother of pearl. 108 morganite beads form the strand. Morganite swells the heart and warms the soul, releasing a sense of smallness in a vast universe and opening to the overwhelming presence of a Higher power. This is a Crystal of Divine Love. It brings healing, compassion, assurance and promise. The guru bead is capped amethyst. Bring the love and compassion of Kuan Yin into your life as you meditate with this wonderful strand. $65

name: Kuan Yin Goddess of Compassion
description: Kuan Yin Goddess of Compassion - A beautiful Kuan Yin is carved in naturally shed bone and stained with terra cotta. The 108 beads are smokey quartz.  The guru bead is a silver capped smokey quartz. Use the mantra Om Mani Padme Hum to reach to Kuan Yin and bring her into your life. $65

name: Mantra for Prosperity
description: Mantra For Prosperity - Lakshmi will hear your mantra to bring prosperity into your life when you ring the chime, sending your mantra to her. The cage for the angel chime is sterling silver. The 108 beads are chrysocolla. Chrysocolla is a stone of empowerment of the feminine energies, teaching that genuine power is best expressed through gentleness. It is a stone of the Goddess, and those who resonate with it will likely feel her ancient and enduring energies rising within themselves. The guru bead is copal. The mantra for prosperity is Om Shrim Maha Lakshmi Yei Swaha. $65

name: Blessed Celtic Path
description: Blessed Celtic Path - An ornate triquetra is carved in naturally shed antler bone. Beside hangs a Goddess. The 90 beads are green jade and capped brown quartz beads. A wonderful strand to help you meditate on the magickal Celtic path that you follow. $65

name: Thousand Arm Kuan Yin
description: Thousand Arm Kuan Yin - A beautiful thousand armed Kuan Yin is carved in carnelian. The thousand arms of Kuan Yin reaches to all the world, bringing comfort and peace.. The 108 beads are smoked quartz. The guru bead is capped honey jade. $65

name: Goddess of Peace and Love
description: Goddess of Peace and Love - A beautiful Goddess is carved in naturally shed bone. The 90 beads are lilac jade, some capped.  Bring the peace and love of the Goddess into your life with this powerful strand. $65

name: Path of the Raven
description: Path of the Raven - A raven is carved in bone. A pewter Goddess hangs beside. The 90 beads are black crab agate and capped crystal beads. Raven activates the energy of magic. It is the symbol of wisdom and magick and links to our will and intention. Wonderful, magickal strand! $65

name: Hummingbird Meditation Strand
description: Hummingbird Totem Meditation Strand - The hummingbird spirit animal symbolizes the enjoyment of life and lightness of being. If you are having a hard time finding enjoyment in life, and the seeing the joy, use this strand.  A beautiful hummingbird is carved from mother of pearl. The 90 beads are chrysocolla and capped lavender jade. Chrysocolla is a very supportive goddess energy stone. Lavender Jade  helps in releasing cynicism and suppressed anger, and to embrace an attitude of serene acceptance $65

name: Triple Moon Goddess
description: Triple Moon Goddess - The Triple Moon Goddess is carved in naturally shed bone. The 90 beads are lapis lazuli and capped amethyst. Wonderful strand to meditate on the presence of the Goddess. $65

name: Prosperous Life
description: Prosperous Life - A sterling silver prosperity coin coin from India opens the strand of 108 green jade beads. Wonderful mala to bring luck and prosperity into your life. The guru bead is handmade in Tibet. $65

name: Breath of LIfe
description: Breath of Life - The Om is the sound of creation! A silver OM opens a strand of 90 sardonyx and capped red honey jade. Sardonyx is a highly protective stone that embodies a vibration of happiness, optimism and confidence. It helps to boost your self control and your level of personal power. Honey Jade - Powerful emotional balance, radiates divine unconditional love. Wonderful strand to bring new life into needed areas in your life! $65

name: Chimes of Heaven
description: Chimes of Heaven - A beautiful, .925 sterling chime opens the strand of 108 rose quartz beads.  The guru bead is a capped morganite.  Ring the chime to send your prayers to Heaven in this wonderful meditation strand. $95

name: Sacred Path of the Hawk
description: Sacred Path of the Hawk - When you have the hawk as a spirit animal, you may have an inclination towards using the power of vision and intuition in your daily life. The hawk totem provides wisdom about seeing situations from a higher perspective, using the power of observation, and focusing on the task at hand. Itâ€™s a good companion to develop spiritual awareness. The 90 beads are carved bone beads, and the hawk is also from bone.  The divider beads are dzi beads capped with silver. Wonderful, powerful strand. $65

name: Magickal Kabbalah
description: Magickal Kabbalah -  Kabbalah is an ancient wisdom that reveals how the universe and life work. A sterling silver mezuzah is marked with a chaim - the symbol for life. A silver pentacle and Goddess are beside it. There are 90 fluorite and capped aquamarine. $65

name: Kuan Yin of the Pure Land
description: Kuan Yin of the Pure Land - This is a Nichiren Buddhism strand.  A stunning, vintage Kuan Yin is carved in jade.  The 108 beads are also very old in this Nichiren strand.  They are carved in antler bone. A very old bead counter is also on the strand. $95

name: Way of the Wolf
description: Way of the Wolf - The wolf is a powerful totem bringing the elements of wisdom, strength, cunning, and strong family ties to your life.  The wolf is exquisitely carved in naturally shed bone and framed in silver.  The guru bead is a smokey quartz capped in silver. Smoky quartz is a very protective and grounding stone. It brings physical and psychic protection. It is also an excellent stone for protection from negative energy, as It removes negativity and negative energy of any kind and transforms them to positive energy. The 108 beads of the strand are hand carved bone.  What an amazing and powerful strand! $95

name: Remove the Unwanted
description: Remove the Unwanted - A kartika knife is held by a strand of 108 handmade coconut husk beads. The knife is a ceremonial piece that is used to cut away the things in your life that cause you pain or hold you back in your life.  The guru bead is handmade in Tibet. NOT LONG ENOUGH TO BE WORN! $60

name: Angelic Song Meditation Strand
description: Angelic Song Meditation Strand - A gorgeous .925 sterling silver chime dangles from 90 fluorite and capped morganite beads. Feel the power as the chime sings your prayer up to the angels!! $95

name: Beautiful Pure Land
description: Beautiful Pure Land - A wonderful Kuan Yin is carved in pale green jade in this wonderful Shin Buddhism strand. There are 108 sardonyx beads.  The guru bead is a gorgeous copal bead wrapped in Tibetan silver.  $60

name: Ancient Earth Path Meditation Strand
description: Ancient Earth Path Meditation Strand - an ornate pentacle is held by 90 sesame jasper and capped red honey jade beads. A wonderful strand to help you tap into the Spiritual path that is Earth. $60

name: Kuan Yin and the Dragon
description: Kuan Yin and the Dragon -  Kuan Yin is serene while she guides the fierce serpent of the deep through tumultuous waves. I see this as a metaphor for the journey of our soul. We, too, are meant to envision and attain the stance of mastery over turbulent happenings. We are called to tame our own inner dragons when they surface midst the upheavals in our lives. The rolling waves are a metaphor for those swift-moving ups and downs we go through. We either ride those waves with grace and serenity or tumble into the restless currents. Kuan Yin helps us tame them.  The picture of Kuan Yin is decoupaged onto a ceramic domino tile! The 108 beads are blue striated jasper - representing the waves of life through which we travel. The guru bead is a capped aquamarine. $60

name: Kuan Yin Hear My Cries
description: Kuan Yin Hear My Cries - The Kuan Yin is carved in pale, translucent jade.  A bell rings to call to Kuan Yin. The 108 beads are alexandrite. The guru bead is a small glass flower $60

name: The Healing Path
description: The Healing Path - A brass bottle opens to hold your healing oil, or holy water in this exquisite strand.  A pewter pentacle dangles beside on this strand of 90 larvikie, black moonstone, some capped. $60

name: Ancient Path
description: Ancient Path - An ornate pentacle is made of pewter symbolizes the faith followed by many of our ancestors. Small silver bells ring your prayers to Heaven.  The 90 beads are jasper beads in various shades of blue. $60

name: Hail To The Goddess Who Hears The Cries of The World
description: Hail To The Goddess Who Hears The Cries of the World - A beautiful Kuan Yin is carved in mother of pearl. A vintage brass bell chimes your cries and prayers to Her. There are 108 white jade beads and the Guru bead is capped fire agate. $60

name: The Seahorse Meditation Strand
description: The Seahorse Meditation Strand - In the deep blue and green of the ocean waters, the seahorse peacefully travels accompanied by the Goddess. A relatively calm, and mild-mannered creature, the seahorse is seemingly content to roam the seas. Their bodies are geared for ambling-type motion - not for speed. Thus, they are symbolic of patience and contentment - they are happy with being where they are. If you need to meditate on the qualities of the seahorse, and bring them into your life, this would be a great strand for you to use. $60

name: Elephant Totem Meditation Strand
description:
Elephant Totem Meditation beads - The elephant is a powerful totem. It represents Ancient Power, Strength and Royalty,
Strength of the Feminine: The Child, the Woman, and the Wise Woman (Matriarchal Head of Family) The vintage elephant in this amazing strand is carved in naturally shed antler bone, and comes from an estate sale. The 90 beads are watermelon tournaline and capped sponge. $60

name: Led By The Moon
description: Led By The Moon -  The Moon has great influence on our lives here on Earth. As the Moon waxes to full, it's power increases bringing power and new growth to all we do.  As the Moon begins to wane, things that are harmful to us and our happiness can be pushed away. This is a wonderful strand showing the phases of the Moon.  The beads are larvikite (black moonstone) and capped Sri Lankan moonstone. $60

name: Magick of the Celtic Moon
description: Magick of the Celtic Moon - A pendant with the phases of the Moon, a pentacle and Celtic knot opens the strand.  A pewter Goddess is beside The 90 beads are Earth tone jasper and capped rudraksha.  Wonderful strand for meditating on the Celtic magickal path! $60

name: The Broom of the Elders
description: The Broom of the Elders - The Elders in the Craft follow the way of the Earth. They follow her seasons and her turnings. The 90 beads in this meditation strand are Moroccan jasper and capped red honey jade. They guru bead is a silver capped copal. Powerful strand to use to tap into the Ancient path. $60

name: Santa in the Christmas Trees
description: Santa in the Christmas Trees - Hand wrapped pin.  $20

name: Kitty Kat Kristmas
description: Kitty Kat Kristmas - A little cat, ready for Christmas hides between the Christmas trees. Hand wrapped Scottish pin. $20

name: Hare/Rabbit Totem Strand
description: Hare/Rabbit totem strand - The hare stands for longevity, and good luck. It is also associated with the Goddess and chaos magick  Two hares trace each other in this vintage black jade piece. A brass pentacle hangs beside.  The 90 beads are howlite and capped feldspar. $60

name: Magickal Celtic Moon
description: Magickal Celtic Moon - The crescent and full Moons are impressed on this gorgeous pewter piece. In the center of the full Moon are Celtic knots. The 90 beads are larvikite (black moonstone) some capped. Feel the power of the magickal Celtic Moon!! $60

name: Remover of Obstacles
description: Ganesha - Remover of Obstacles - A Ganesha is carved in red jade. The 108 beads are carved bone and the guru bead is copal. Let Ganesha remove the obstacles to the life you want in this meditation strand. $60

name: Path of the Deer - Strand of Happiness
description: Path of the Deer - Strand of Happiness - a deer is carved in beautiful vintage jade in this wonderful strand. In China the deer is a symbol of happiness and good fortune. Indeed, its name in Chinese is a homonym for the word abundance. The 108 beads are fancy jasper. The guru bead is brown and white copal. $60P

name: Strand of Plenty
description: Strand of Plenty - In Asian culture, the fish is a symbol of surplus and prosperity.  2 fish are carved in this beautiful vintage jade piece. The 108 beads are hand carved bone.The guru bead is copal capped in Tibetan silver.  $60

name: Drawing Down the Moon
description: Drawing Down The Moon - A priestess raises her arms - drawing the power of the Full Moon down into her body in this strand of 90 hematite and capped amethyst beads.  Wonderful and powerful!! $60

name: Buddha of Joy and Prosperity
description: Buddha of Joy and Prosperity - A wonderful, laughing Buddha is carved in purple jade. The 108 beads are purple sesame jasper and capped lilac jade.  Meditate on bringing joy and prosperity into your life with this wonderful strand. $60

name: Goddess and the Waters of Life
description: Goddess and the Waters of Life - From a strand of 90 blue dragons's vein and capped aquamarine beads dangle a carved spiral and pewter Goddess.  From the waters of the Goddess comes all of life! $60

name: Rhiannon
description: Rhiannon - Goddess of the Horse - On a vintage pewter Irish button is imprinted a trinity of Celtic horses.  A pewter Goddess is beside.  The 90 beads are fancy jasper and capped peridot. $60

name: Namo Kuan Shi Yin Pusa
description: Namo Kuan Shi Yin Pusa - a beautiful Kuan Yin is carved in yellow tiger eye. The 108 beads are a riot of colorful jasper. Feel the beauty and peace brought by Kuan Yin as you use this wonderful strand for meditation. Mantra: Namo Kuan Shi Yin Pusa. Translation: I am greeting Her who listen (with mercy) the voices of the world. $60

name: The Lotus
description: The Lotus - A beautiful lotus is carved in green/white jade.  The lotus is the symbol of renewal and rebirth.  From the murky bottom of the pond, the beautiful lotus grows. Rising above the dark and muddy water the beautiful flower emerges - a symbol that with faith and determination, we can rise above anything! There are 108 jewel toned jasper beads in the strand.  The guru bead is a carved copal bead. $60

name: The Eternal Path
description: The Eternal Path -  Beautiful brown tourmaline and capped red honey quartz form the strand which holds the symbols of eternity.  What a powerful strand to use to meditate on the Eternal Path. $60

name: Mighty Thor
description: Mighty Thor - Thor's hammer is cast in bronze.  The 90 beads are larvikite (black moonstone) - some capped. Thor, with his hammer can crush a mountain of problems that are in your life. $60

name: Ganesha - Remover of Obstacles
description: Ganesha - Remover of Obstacles - Are there obstacles in your life that need to be removed? The Ganesha is carved in Tibetan turquoise.  There are 108 honey jade and lemon jade beads in the strand.  The guru bead is carved copal. Wonderful strand if you need help to get things out of the way and open the path to a productive, successful life. $60

name: Holy Prayers
description: Holy Prayers -  A vintage brass bell chimes your prayers up to Heaven in this strand of 108 lilac alexandrite beads. The chamber is Tibetan silver and opens to hold your prayers. The guru bead is mystic amethyst. A powerful strand. $60

name: The Witches Path
description: a wonderful pentacle is cast in pewter.  A pewter  Goddess dangles beside.  The 90 beads are black lava and capped sesame jasper. The guru bead is a silver capped copal. $60

name: The Heart of Magick
description: The Heart of Magick - A brass pentacle with crescent moons and a heart open the strand.  Beside it is a brass Goddess. The Goddess brings her love and love to fill your life in this strand of 90 watermelon tourmaline and capped crystal beads.  If magick is the heart of your life, you will find much power in this strand! $60

name: Ancient Sacred Path
description: Ancient Sacred Path - A beautiful, pentacle is forged in brass.  A brass Goddess dangles beside.  The 90 beads are earth jasper and capped honey red jade.  Use this incredible strand to meditate on the sacred path that was followed by thousands of our ancestors. $60

name: Power of the Moon
description: Power of the Moon meditation strand.  A hand cast pewter pendant shows the phases, and is signed on the back by the artist. A pewter Goddess hangs beside.  The 90 beads are larvikite (black moon stone) and capped hematite. Powerful, wonderful strand to meditate on the power of the Moon! $60

name: The Goddess and The Tree of Life
description: The Goddess and the Tree of Life - A beautiful pewter Tree of Life and a pewter Goddess are suspended from 90 imperial jade and capped rudraksha beads.  The guru bead is a beautiful copal bead. $60

name: The Path of Wisdom
description: The Path of Wisdom - An owl is framed in in Tibetan silver.  A silver Goddess dangles beside.  The owl is the symbol of mystery and magick, wisdom and protection, old secrets. The 90 beads are purple kiwi jasper and capped lilac jade. $50

name: Brooms of the Elders Meditation Strand
description: Brooms of the Elders Meditation Strand - Brooms of the Witch Elders form a pentacle in this wonderful piece. A pewter Goddess dangles beside.  The 90 beads are larvikite (black moon stone) some capped. Use this strand to tap into the magickal knowledge of the Elders of the Magickal craft! $50

name: The Green Man Meditation Strand
description: The Green Man Meditation Strand - Deep in the Autumn forest, the Green Man waits to bring life back to the Earth with the beginning of spring. The 90 beads are rudraksha beads and copal.  Wonderful strand of power and new birth. $50

name: Magick of the Celts
description: Magick of the Celts -  A pewter pendant with the moon phases is adorned with a pentacle and Celtic knot opens the strand. A pewter Goddess hangs beside. The 90 beads are hand carved, naturally shed bone, some capped.  The guru bead is green copal.  If you follow the Celtic path, this is an amazing meditation strand for you. $50

name: Spiral - the Key to Wisdom
description: Spiral the Key To Wisdom - A spiral is held on a handmade turquoise and copal pendant.  A vintage brass key is beside it. The 90 beads are citrine, quartz and copal. $50

name: Ladybug Meditation Strand
description:
Ladybug Meditation Strand - 
Ladybug's medicine includes carrying the golden strand that leads to the centre of the universe, past lives, spiritual enlightenment, death and rebirth, renewal, regeneration, fearlessness, protection, good luck, wishes being fulfilled, protection.  There are 108 watermelon tourmaline beads. The guru bead is also watermelon tourmaline. A beautiful ladybug and eternity symbol complete the strand. $50

name: The Owl Priestess
description: The Owl Priestess - A beautiful priestess follows the Path of Wisdom - the Path of the Owl, intricately carved in naturally shed bone. The 90 beads are imperial jasper and capped brown quartz. $50

name: The White Tara
description: The White Tara - The White Tara is the symbol of healing and serenity. A wonderful strand to help you tap into Her energy.  108 red honey jade form the strand.  The guru bead is orange copal capped in silver, from Tibet.  The White Tara is carved in white jade. $50

name: Sacred Dance
description: Sacred Dance - A Priestess spins in a magickal dance beside a myriad of spirals - the dance of life. The 90 beads are rudraksha - holy seeds, some capped. The guru bead is a silver capped green copal bead from Tibet. Such a wonderful strand - dance with the joy of life while you hold this amazing meditation strand. $50

name: The Red Tara
description: The Red Tara - The Red Tara is a magnet for all the good things is life.  She is fierce in her protection of good fortune.  She is carved in red jade.  The 108 beads are carved red bone, and the guru bead is copal.  A wonderful strand to attract into your life all the things you desire. $50
